name: Crowd King — Stickman Defense
description:
Meet one of the most exciting clash games of all time! You start the battle alone but trust us: there is no chance you'll feel lonely.

This castle takeover game combines fascinating graphics with simple mechanics. You have a chance to get absorbed in the bright world of Crowd King full of gang fights and stickman battles. Get ready to spend hours playing one of the most thrilling running games.

How to play?
1. Collect bonuses
2. Run away from the crowd
3. Defeat enemies
4. Take over the castles!

GAME FEATURES :
- Beautiful and unique 3D visuals
- High performance
- Fun, relaxing and addictive
- Dynamic race
- Survival city game
- Lots of unique levels
- Deadly traps and impossible obstacles
- Crisp bright graphics
- Super smooth swipe control
- Satisfying color explosions
- Rewards and gifts

Do you think you have the guts to take your crowd through this insane obstacle course? Try your luck!
